ranks.text: Once you gain access to Shinjuku, visit the Crossroads bar and talk to her. You'll have met her earlier in the story at this point. Unlocks Rumor-filled Scoop, which means Palace Alert levels won't increase so quickly and will decrease a little overnight.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Bonus: Charm Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Charm Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Grants the Shocking Scoop ability, improving the effect of Rumor-filled scoop. Bonus: Charm Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Charm Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Charm Up
choices: Choice 4: "You're a great journalist." +2 / "That's the spirit." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Outrageous Scoop, improving the effect of Shocking Scoop. Bonus: Charm Up
choices: Choice 2: "Let's think of another way." +3 / "Don't let him provoke you." +3 / "Calm down." +2
Choice 3: "You're charming as you are." +3 / "You should work on that." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Fighting for Truth in Journalism. Complete the Fighting for Truth in Journalism sidequest, then return to Ichiko to rank up. Conus: Charm Up

This is the point when a romance with Ichiko Ohya becomes available. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Romance - "I took it seriously."Friendship - "I didn't take it seriously."Romance - "I love you, Ichiko."Friendship - "I'm just kidding."
choices: Choice 2: "You're not giving up, are you?" +2
Choice 3: "I can't leave you." +3 / "I want to help." +3

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Legendary Scoop, eliminating Palace security level increases.

name: Ichiko
location: Crossroads Bar in Shinjuku at night
